summary: Set in the 1930s Arab states at the dawn of the oil boom, the story centers on a young Arab prince torn between allegiance to his conservative father and modern, liberal father-in-law.
cast: Tahar Rahim|Antonio Banderas|Mark Strong|Freida Pinto|Riz Ahmed|Liya Kebede|Corey Johnson|Akin Gazi|Eriq Ebouaney|Lotfi Dziri|Jan Uddin|Hichem Rostom|Taoufik Ayeb|Mostafa Gaafar|Driss Roukhe|Ali Bennor|Raouf Ben Amor|Jamil Joudi|Ramsi Lehner|Mohamed Ali Nahdi|Walid Nahdi|Med Kouka|Mahmoud Larnaout|Fethi Akkari|Adriano Giannini|Abdelmajid Lakhal|Mohamed Sassi Ghorbali|Tayeb Oueslati|Ziad Ghaoui|Abdellatif Kheireddine|Kaoutar Boudarraja|Rania Gabsi|Abdellatif Bouallegue|Helmi Dridi|Dalila Meftahi|Mourad Bennefla|Jamal Awar|Saifeddine Louati|Med Sayari|Bechir Salhi|Abderrazek Abdessalem|Amar Adatia|Faycal Albaker|Mohammed Alibrahim|Mondher Aouidet|Sarah Aoussaji|Chedly Arfaoui|Salah Azadou|Mohamed Hedi Bahri|Maram Ben Aziza|Selim Ben Chaâbane|Kamel Bouazizi|Kamel Bouazizi|Sofiène Chaâri|Pamela Djambou|Camel Driver|Yassine Ebdelli|Tahar Fattah|Mohamed Grayaâ|Tarick Hadouch|Ahmed Hafiane|George Julius Williams|Ahmed Kahouech|Arbi Khemiri|Saad Ksiksi|Stephane Linet|Hammadi Maaroufi|Skander Mkaddem|Medhi Naji|Adel Rabah|Arij Riahi|Hatem Ben Soltana|Moncef Souissi|Myriam Toure|Salah Zemzemi|Abdelasselem Zorgani|Ghanem Zrelli
title: Oro negro
